title: The Real Green Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Indian, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Catering, Fusion
description: Plant based cafe opened Jun 2015 originally at East Court, Phoenix MarketCity Mall and moved here in 2016. Promotes healthful eating. Offers wraps, cakes, and coffee drinks and dairy-free ingredients.
streetAddress: Shop 17, First Floor, The Hub, North Main Rd, Koregaon Park
